icontrol.drivers

Interface GPIB_NI.gpib32

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.sun.jna.Library
    Enclosing class:
    GPIB_NI

    private static interface GPIB_NI.gpib32
extends com.sun.jna.Library
    Defines the interface required by JNA to invoke the native library.

    This interface defines all function calls 'into' the native code (.dll / .dylib). It is the standard, stable way of mapping, which supports extensive customization and mapping of Java to native types.

    Please note that all function declaration have been imported from ni488.h, but only the uncommented method declarations have been tested. To use a native function that is currently commented, uncomment it, ensure the data type conversion is correct, and test it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.sun.jna.Library
